Test Name: STRATIFY JCV Antibody (with Index) with Reflex to Inhibition
Purpose: Detection of antibodies against JC virus to evaluate risk for progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy (PML).
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or plain red-top tube
Equipment: Microplate reader, micropipettes, incubator (37 Â°C), vortex mixer, laboratory timer
